SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.network.virtual_view

Class VVServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.network.virtual_view.VVServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionAgent, ActionListener, ActionPoster
public class VVServer extends Object implements ActionPoster, ActionListener
VirtualView/Server class is the main junction between the network and tha MVC pattern. It receives the incoming request of connection and Actions and handles them by managing them calling the right classes. This class works like a "mediator".

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static int
    activeConnections
    Attribute introduced to monitor the active client number

    serverOn
    Boolean flag which indicates if the server is running

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    VVServer()
    Constructor for VVServer 1)Creates the protocol managers 2)Creates a new list to contain the future parties 3)Creates a new list for orphan clients (the ones that aren't logged in a Party yet) 4)Creates a new list of listeners

    • getPartyByID

      public NetworkParty getPartyByID(int partyID) throws NonExistentPartyException
      Getter for party reference by its ID (with linear search (O(n), n = num of parties)
      Parameters:
      partyID - the ID number of the party to search
      Returns:
      the party as reference (null if not found)
      Throws:
      NonExistentPartyException - if the Party doesn't exist

    • getClientInAPartyByID

      public NetworkClient getClientInAPartyByID(int playerID) throws NonExistentClientException
      Getter for reference to a client by its ID (with linear search (O(n*m), n = num of parties, m = num of clients in the party)
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the client to search
      Returns:
      the client as reference (null if not found)
      Throws:
      NonExistentClientException - if the client doesn't exist in any Party

    • getOrphanClientByID

      Parameters:
      clientID - the ID of the client to search
      Returns:
      the client as reference (null if not found)
      Throws:
      NonExistentClientException - if the client doesn't exist as orphan

    • getClientByID

      public NetworkClient getClientByID(int clientID) throws NonExistentClientException
      Getter for reference to a client by its ID (in the orphan list or in the active parties) (with linear search)
      Parameters:
      clientID - the ID of the client to search
      Returns:
      the client as reference (null if not found)
      Throws:
      NonExistentClientException - if the client doesn't exist on either orphans list or in the Parties

    • onEvent

      public void onEvent(Action event)
      This method receives an action, generated by an event. Once notified, the implementer must answer to the notification (a call of "onEvent" when a condition is verified). Implementer will call the Action "do" (when "ExampleMessage" is received, do...)
      Specified by:
      onEvent in interface ActionListener
      Parameters:
      event - The event action. Basing on the information in the message, onEvent do something

    • createNewParty

      public int createNewParty(int totalNumOfClients)
      Method to create a generic new party
      Parameters:
      totalNumOfClients - to set the total number of clients expected for this lobby. Once reached, a new game will start
      Returns:
      the PartyID

    • createNewParty

      public int createNewParty(int totalNumOfClients, NetworkClient creator) throws ClientAlreadyLoggedException, NonExistentClientException
      Method to create a new party with more specific information
      Parameters:
      totalNumOfClients - the total number of clients of the party
      creator - the client which is the creator of the party
      Returns:
      the new party partyID
      Throws:
      ClientAlreadyLoggedException - if the creator is already logged in another party
      NonExistentClientException - if the creator doesn't exist

    • createNewOrphanClient

      Returns:
      the ClientID

    • logClientInAParty

      public void logClientInAParty(int partyID, int clientID) throws NonExistentClientException, NonExistentPartyException, ClientAlreadyLoggedException
      Method to add a new client to a party. As requirement, the partID must exist.
      Parameters:
      partyID - the ID number of the party where add the client
      clientID - the ID of the client
      Throws:
      NonExistentClientException - if the client doesn't exist
      NonExistentPartyException - if the party doesn't exist
      ClientAlreadyLoggedException - if the client is already logged in another Party

    • breakUpAParty

      public void breakUpAParty(int partyID, NetworkClient deleterClient)
      This method break up a party
      Parameters:
      partyID - the party to break up
      deleterClient - the client which has disconnected at first

    • initServer

      public void initServer(int portTCP, int portRMI, String hostName)
      This method call the initCommunication() method on the Network Managers and sets hostName and port on the managers. It also allows to turn off the server application through user input
      Parameters:
      portTCP - the port of the server for RMI
      portRMI - the port of the server for RMI
      hostName - the name of the server

    • sendOnNetworkUnicast

      public void sendOnNetworkUnicast(int playerID, Data data)
      Method to send a data to a specific player
      Parameters:
      playerID - (clientID) the ID number of a player
      data - the data packet to send (using jackson encapsulation)

    • sendOnNetworkBroadcastInAParty

      public void sendOnNetworkBroadcastInAParty(int partyID, Data data)
      Method to send data to all the players in a specific party
      Parameters:
      partyID - the party in which to send the message
      data - the data to send (jackson)

    • sendOnNetworkMulticast

      public void sendOnNetworkMulticast(List<Integer> recipients, Data data)
      Method to send a data to a defined group of players
      Parameters:
      recipients - the list of the clientIDs
      data - the data to send

    • sendOnNetworkOneActiveOtherPassive

      public void sendOnNetworkOneActiveOtherPassive(int partyID, int activePlayerID, Data activeData, Data passiveData)
      Method to send in a network two different message in the same party at the same time
      Parameters:
      partyID - the party in which to send the data
      activePlayerID - the player which will receive the active data
      activeData - the active data to send to the active player
      passiveData - the passive data to send to the others
